segments.text: What are we eating for lunch ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have no idea . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ate pizza the other day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , what do you feel like eating then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I already had a burger yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are we going to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can just each get what we want to get .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know a place that sells pizza and burgers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think they sell both at the cafeteria .
segments.speaker: S2
